programme.title: UNNAMED MEMORY SEASON 2
programme.desc: Crown Prince Oscar of Farsas seeks a cure in Tuldarr, where Tinasha sleeps in a secret chamber accessible only to him.

programme.title: UNNAMED MEMORY SEASON 2
programme.desc: While Oscar is away, Tinasha is kidnapped by a band of robbers who demand Akashia in exchange for her.

programme.title: UNNAMED MEMORY SEASON 2
programme.desc: Tinasha's water is poisoned, Regis of Tuldarr is attacked. Then Delia appears to Oscar and says she can lift his curse.

programme.desc: Civil war looms in Yarda. Princess Nephelli of Yarda flees temporarily to Farsas, only to be targeted by an assassin.
